message: Welcome! I'm offering a high-quality product today. Given the uncertainty about its value to you, I encourage you to consider the reputation of my sales record. With a 50% chance of receiving a high-quality item, our past transactions might give you confidence in the product's value. Please review my track record before making your decision.
